original_text:
Beetle Jewels
Negli ultimi anni la software house iSoftBet ha proposto nel suo catalogo diverse slot machine che si caratterizzano per una grafica molto avanzata e per un solidissimo gameplay, spesso supportato da programmi sviluppati da altri provider.
Beetle Jewels è una slot machine che pur non spiccando per originalità o modalità di gioco particolarmente articolata risulta essere molto accattivante per quanto riguarda il compartimento grafico e anche semplice e intuitiva da giocare, rendendola adatta pure a coloro che non sono esperti o che si affacciano per la prima volta nel mondo delle slot.
Beetle Jewels può essere giocata anche in modalità play for fun in tutti i principali casinò online, in questo modo potrete scoprirne tutti i trucchi prima di giocare investendo del denaro vero.
Il return to player di questa slot machine si attesta sul 96,4%, una percentuale abbastanza alta, se si considera che la maggior parte dei giochi di slot raramente supera il 96 %.
La volatilità di Beetle Jewels è medio-alta, ciò significa che sebbene le vincite non siano così frequenti, si può ambire a ottenere dei premi anche di alto valore.
Tema, simboli e gameplay di Beetle Jewels
Il tema si sviluppa in una foresta incantata e i protagonisti sono degli scarabei che hanno una pietra preziosa al posto del corpo.
Per quando riguarda la struttura, Beetle Jewels è una slot molto semplice, con cinque rulli e sole dieci linee di pagamento, su cui si possono puntare da 10 centesimi fino a un massimo di 10 €. Il valore del gettone è compreso tra un centesimo e 1 €, e si possono scommettere fino a 10 gettoni per giro, uno per ogni linea.
Gli scarabei rappresentano i simboli della slot e si alternano sui rulli con i numeri e le lettere corrispondenti alle carte da gioco dal 10 all’Asso.
Gli scarabei sono caratterizzati da colori diversi a cui corrisponde anche un valore diverso: lo scarabeo rosso col corpo arancione è quello che ha il valore più alto di tutti e che permette di ottenere la vincita massima di ben 5000 monete se compare su tutti i cinque rulli. Lo scarabeo verde con la gemma blu vale fino a 2000 monete, mentre quello con la gemma verde e quello con la gemma viola hanno un valore massimo di 750 monete.
Simboli Wild e Scatter di Beetle Jewels
Lo scarabeo viola con la gemma blu è il simbolo speciale di Beetle Jewels in quanto ricopre sia il ruolo di Wild sia quello di Scatter. Come Wild funge da jolly e sostituisce tutti gli altri simboli nel completamento di una combinazione vincente, mentre come Scatter regala 10 giri gratuiti se compare sui rulli per 3, 4 o 5 volte.
Durante i giri gratuiti viene selezionato in maniera casuale un simbolo speciale che diventerà espandibile, aumentando così le possibilità di ottenere delle vincite.

raw_translation.response:
Beetle Jewels:
In recent years, iSoftBet has offered a number of slot machines that are known for their advanced graphics and solid gameplay, often supported by programs developed by other providers. Beetle Jewels is a slot machine that, while not particularly original or complex in its gameplay, is very eye-catching when it comes to graphics and is also simple and intuitive to play, making it suitable even for those who are not experienced or are new to the world of slots.

Beetle Jewels can also be played in "play for fun" mode at all major online casinos, allowing you to discover all the tricks before playing with real money. The return to player for this slot machine stands at 96.4%, a fairly high percentage considering that most slot games rarely exceed 96%. Beetle Jewels has a medium to high volatility, which means that while the wins may not be frequent, you can aspire to receive high value prizes.

Theme, Symbols and Gameplay of Beetle Jewels:
The theme is set in an enchanted forest and the protagonists are beetles with precious stones in place of their bodies. Beetle Jewels is a simple slot machine with five reels and only ten paylines. You can bet from 10 cents up to a maximum of 10 €. The value of each coin ranges from one cent to one euro, and you can bet up to 10 coins per spin, one per line.

The beetles represent the symbols of the slot and alternate on the reels with the numbers and letters corresponding to playing cards from 10 to Ace. The beetles are characterized by different colors, each corresponding to a different value. The red beetle with the orange body has the highest value of all and allows you to win up to 5000 coins if it appears on all five reels. The green beetle with the blue gem is worth up to 2000 coins, while the one with the green gem and the one with the purple gem have a maximum value of 750 coins.

Wild and Scatter symbols of Beetle Jewels:
The purple beetle with the blue gem is the special symbol of Beetle Jewels as it serves both as a Wild and as a Scatter. As a Wild, it acts as a joker and replaces all other symbols in completing a winning combination, while as a Scatter it gives away 10 free spins if it appears on the reels three, four or five times. During free spins, a special symbol is randomly selected that becomes expandable, thus increasing the chances of winning.

Review: Beetle Jewels
In recent years, the iSoftBet software house has introduced various slot machines into its catalog that stand out for their advanced graphics and solid gameplay, often supported by programs developed by other providers.
Beetle Jewels is a slot machine that, although not particularly original or complex in terms of gameplay, is very attractive in terms of graphics and also simple and intuitive to play, making it suitable even for those who are not experienced or are new to the world of slots.
Beetle Jewels can also be played in play for fun mode in all major online casinos, so you can discover all the tricks before playing with real money.
The return to player of this slot machine is around 96.4%, a fairly high percentage, considering that most slot games rarely exceed 96%.
The volatility of Beetle Jewels is medium-high, which means that although winnings are not so frequent, you can aspire to obtain high-value prizes.
Theme, symbols, and gameplay of Beetle Jewels
The theme is set in an enchanted forest and the protagonists are beetles that have a precious stone in place of their body.
As for the structure, Beetle Jewels is a very simple slot, with five reels and only ten pay lines, on which you can bet from 10 cents up to a maximum of 10 €. The value of the chip ranges from one cent to 1 €, and you can bet up to 10 chips per spin, one for each line.
The beetles represent the slot symbols and alternate on the reels with the numbers and letters corresponding to the playing cards from 10 to Ace.
The beetles are characterized by different colors, each corresponding to a different value: the red beetle with an orange body is the highest value symbol that allows you to win a maximum of 5000 coins if it appears on all five reels. The green beetle with the blue gem is worth up to 2000 coins, while the ones with the green and purple gems have a maximum value of 750 coins.
Wild and Scatter symbols of Beetle Jewels
The purple beetle with the blue gem is the special symbol of Beetle Jewels as it plays both the role of Wild and Scatter. As a Wild, it acts as a wild card and replaces all other symbols in completing a winning combination, while as a Scatter, it gives away 10 free spins if it appears on the reels three, four, or five times.
During the free spins, a special symbol is randomly selected and becomes expandable, thus increasing the chances of winning.

The symbols of Beetle Jewels are beetles with different colors, each corresponding to a different value. The red beetle with an orange body is the highest value symbol that pays a maximum of 5000 coins. The green beetle with the blue gem is worth up to 2000 coins, while the ones with the green and purple gems have a maximum value of 750 coins. The purple beetle with the blue gem is the special symbol of Beetle Jewels that plays the role of both Wild and Scatter. It replaces all other symbols in completing a winning combination while giving away 10 free spins if it appears on the reels three, four, or five times. During the free spins, a special symbol is randomly selected and becomes expandable, increasing the chances of winning.

Betting Options

The value of the chip ranges from one cent to 1 €, and you can bet up to 10 chips per spin, one for each line. The minimum bet is 10 cents, and the maximum is 10 €. Beetle Jewels has five reels and ten pay lines.

Return to Player and Volatility

The return to player (RTP) of Beetle Jewels is around 96.4%, which is a fairly high percentage compared to other slot games. The volatility of this slot machine is medium-high, which means that although winnings are not so frequent, you can aspire to obtain high-value prizes.

Play for Fun Mode

Beetle Jewels can be played in play for fun mode in all major online casinos. This feature allows you to discover all the tricks before investing real money in the game.
